#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstdio>
 
using namespace std;
#define MAX 500
typedef long long ll;
typedef long L;
 
char ones[4] = {'0','4','6','9'};
char two[1] = {'8'};
 
char * conv(int holes)
{
	char * arr = (char *) malloc (MAX*sizeof(char));
	if(holes == 0)
	{
		arr[0] = '1';
		arr[1] = '\0';
		return arr;
	}
	else if(holes == 1)
	{
		arr[0] = '0';
		arr[1] = '\0';
		return arr;
	}
	else if(holes % 2 == 0)
	{
		int i = 0;
		while(holes > 0)
		{
			arr[i++] = two[0];
			holes -= 2;
		}
		arr[i] = '\0';
		return arr;
	}
	else if(holes % 2 == 1)
	{
		int i = 1;
		arr[0] = ones[1];
		holes -= 1;
		while(holes > 0)
		{
			arr[i++] = two[0];
			holes -= 2;
		}
		arr[i] = '\0';
		return arr;
	}
}
 
 
 
int main()
{
	int holes;
	scanf("%d",&holes);
	char * ptr = conv(holes);
	int i = 0;
	while(ptr[i] != '\0')
	{
		printf("%c",ptr[i++]);
	}
	printf("\n");
	return 0;
}
